entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
